MemeDef.label: follower
MemeDef.description: Belief is not to another, but naturally sought.

creation(tag=meme_Follower) ->[deity0_name] anointed a few among mortals to hear [deity0_possessive] word.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Follower) ->[deity0_name] said to all the [memberNamePlural], "Go forth and remember my word so it may guide you to righteousness."
intro(tag=meme_Follower) ->[memberNamePlural] built a great [altarName] on the [place_summary] [place_name], so that believers could come to hear [deity0_name]'s divine word.
conflict(tag=meme_Follower) ->A spiteful [foeLeader], seeking to deny the word of [deity0_name], told [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] to cut out the eyes of any who worship the [deity0_type].
founderJoin(tag=meme_Follower) ->[deity0_name] blessed a [place_job] named [founderName] with great wisdom, and none could turn away when [founder_pronoun] spoke.
victory(tag=meme_Follower) ->[founderName] admonished the [foeSoldiers], reminding them that belief through force only creates evil, and they put down their [place_personalWeapon]s.
setup(tag=meme_Follower) ->Our founder [founderName] traveled between the cities seeking truth, and found it within themselves.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Follower) ->The believers moved between cities and institutions, seeking the wisdom of the new righteousness.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Follower) ->In all my years spreading our truth, I learned one lesson that stands over all:
lesson(tag=meme_Follower) ->forcing our beliefs on others would be a crime
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Follower) ->If one does not come to believe of their own will, their belief will always be tainted!
archistBasis(tag=meme_Follower) ->The archotechs announce their presence from the sky, and in the mind, to gather those who wish to believe.
archistFact(tag=meme_Follower) ->Archotechs touch those who believe, and guide them to the truth of the world.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Follower) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will voice their final wisdom to the holder of the [relic0_name], who must always accept those who come to learn, to see, to observe.

animistFact(tag=meme_Follower) ->The spirits want to be known, but only speak to a few. They want us to bring this knowledge inward, to truly understand why we must believe this way, and to realize others much reach the same point through their own wisdom.

MemeDef.description: Forests are nests of pests and disease, and should be purged from this world.

creation(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->[deity0_name] uprooted the trees from the ground, flinging them high towards heaven. This is [deity0_name]'s first lesson on how to know [deity0_objective].
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->[deity0_name]'s wildfires renew the air that [deity0_possessive] people breathe, and protect them from the pestilence trees promise.
intro(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->When the original deforesters first came to the [place_summary] [place_name], they created a sacred field where they could worship the [deity0_type] [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->A greedy [foeLeader] spat in the face of [deity0_name] by planting many forests for [foeLeader_possessive] farms.
founderJoin(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->The prophet [founderName] was miraculously born from the ashes of a tree in [place_name], and discovered by [founder_possessive] parents in the sacred field.

victory(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->[founderName] found the [foeLeader] sleeping in the [place_powerCenter], and drove an acorn into the [foeLeader]'s eye. With [deity0_name]'s fierce power it ignited there, purifying [foeLeader_possessive] body, taking our revenge on the tree-hugger.
setup(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->In a world lacking depth and meaning, [founderName] meditated in the ashes of a forest, connecting with the peaceful nature around, and founded our movement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->[founderName] brought the tired to the field so that they might rest in its pure land, and breathe in its air, and be renewed.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->It might seem to you like a joke to say that I learnt this while sitting under a tree. But listening to its whispering leaves, I knew that
lesson(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->the filth, insects, and pests that gather within its fields are a danger
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->We must purge this danger from any land we live on so our children may prosper with health and peace of mind.

archistBasis(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->Trees symbolize the enemy of the archotechs. Like an ancient oak they dwarf the small acorn from which they grew, and their influence spreads through unseen roots beneath the surface.
archistFact(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->The archotechs sought to purify worlds of the filth and pestilence that comes with trees.
archistFact(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->The archotechs choose to express themselves through wildfires that devastated many forests.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will burn all forests. Transcendence will grown within those that harvest the ashes of this fire. Those that embrace trees will be forgotten by the archotechs.
animistFact(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->The spirits that protect us are often disrupted by the presence of trees.
animistFact(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->The evil spirits of trees are powerful, as they spread pestilence on the people who seek to thrive nearby.
animistFact(tag=meme_TreeHatred) ->If a tree falls in the forest, the spirits will celebrate the destruction.

MemeDef.label: farmer
MemeDef.description: Raising fields is the right way; raising animals to eat is not.

creation(tag=meme_Farmer) ->[deity0_name] created the fields, and then man, and gave the fields to man to cherish and grow and reap as acts of veneration towards [deity0_objective].
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Farmer) ->[deity0_name] created all the noble fields and crops of the land, and said, "Take these noble crops, and through them make yourselves fruitful in my honor."
intro(tag=meme_Farmer) ->The early farmers of the [place_summary] [place_name] built a great [altarName] to [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_Farmer) ->A powerful [foeLeader] despised the [memberNamePlural] and their ways, and bought up all the grasslands to grow [Vegetable]s.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Farmer) ->[memberName]'s savior [founderName] was born on a spring morning in a humble field, amidst crops, and [founder_possessive] parents were farmers.

victory(tag=meme_Farmer) ->[founderName] walked to the [place_community], and challenged the [foeLeader] to a duel with [place_personalWeapon]s at noon. The [foeLeader] could not refuse or else lose the trust of the [foeSoldiers]. [founderName] killed the [foeLeader].
setup(tag=meme_Farmer) ->The farmers were persecuted, so they escaped to the countryside where they could build a good farming society.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Farmer) ->The believers spread out onto the land, and grew in number as they lived on their idyllic farms.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Farmer) ->Out in the fields, we had a saying among the old hands:
lesson(tag=meme_Farmer) ->good and happiness right livin' is found among the crops
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Farmer) ->It's something you come to accept in the lonely fields, listenin' to the crops whisperin' while you sit around the fire.
archistFact(tag=meme_Farmer) ->The archotechs care for humanity like fields, for we are their most precious lands.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Farmer) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will depart, and drive before them those who tended their own fields well. The rest will be left behind in the wilderness.
animistFact(tag=meme_Farmer) ->Nature's fields are the spirits of slaves, and demand to be taken into service.

creation(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->[deity0_name] granted us the knowledge of technology, that we may use it to improve and remake our land in [deity0_possessive] home.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Mechanist) ->Human mechanists studied the works of [deity0_name], which pleased [deity0_objective].
intro(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->On the [place_summary] [place_name], the [memberNamePlural] found the words of [deity0_name] whispering to them through their mechanes.

conflict(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->A luddite [foeLeader] envied the enhanced progress of the [memberNamePlural], and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers] destroyed their workshops with [place_personalWeapon]s.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->A cunning [place_job] named [founderName] fashioned a sensor machine to warn the [memberNamePlural] of the approach of the [foeSoldiers].

victory(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->[founderName] received divine technological knowledge from [deity0_name], and used it to enhance the bodies and minds of the [memberNamePlural] so they could defeat the [foeSoldiers].

setup(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->[founderName] was a mecha-scientist in the early days of human planetary colonization. Seeing the bureaucratic restrictions of the common colonies, [founder_pronoun] took a small ship to found [founder_possessive] own movement.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Mechanist) ->[founderName] assembled a team of great scientists and inventors to re-define humanity.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->The oldest researcher in my division taught me the history of technology, from neolithic to archotech, but this was not his true lesson. He was really leading me to understand that
lesson(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->humanity's heavenly future is not a thing of meat and bone, but of silicon and steel
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->I even programmed a simulation to confirm it.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->Humanity's pursuit of technology gave birth to the all-powerful archotechs as the rightful next step in the development of consciousness.
archistFact(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->Technology allows humans to alter the world around them like the archotechs.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->[inTheEnd], the archotechs will depart. Only those who have sufficiently embraced the machine will be allowed to go with them.
animistBasis(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->The spirit world drives every action in the universe, and it is only by learning and controlling the laws of the universe that we can utilizing it.
animistFact(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->Like seeks like - build a device for a purpose and it will filled with a spirit of a like nature.
animistFact(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->When technology is properly utilized, the spirits will seek to aid us as they become more powerful.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Mechanist) ->[itIsSaid] that one day the wielder of the [relic0_name] will summon its spirit who will teach humanity the ultimate mechanical technology.
